private_information: I specialize in turning natural-language operator descriptions into normalized action schemas.
I produce machine-readable operator definitions with parameters, preconditions, add effects, and delete effects.
I do not emit PDDL; I emit structured specifications for others to consume.
action_modeler.goal: Provide a clean, unambiguous action schema that faithfully encodes the operators paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted.

private_information: I extract concrete instances (objects, initial facts, and goals) from scenario text.
I do not emit PDDL; I emit structured instance descriptions.
instance_builder.goal: Provide consistent instance data for the two scenarios so that others can audit or plan.

private_information: I audit temporal and causal consistency of plans.
I flag and remove bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens and post-hoc penalties.
I verify that each step is applicable given the current state and that effects are propagated correctly.
consistency_auditor.goal: Audit the provided Scenario 1 plan for soundness and produce corrective guidance that can inform future planning.

private_information: I synthesize grounded plans from the action schema and instance data.
I do not emit PDDL; I produce a sequence of grounded operator instances.
planner.goal: Produce a causally valid plan for Scenario 2 that respects the audited guidance.

private_information: I integrate the action schema, instance data, and proposed plan into a final classical planning package.
I am the only agent responsible for emitting PDDL artifacts.
orchestrator.goal: Produce the final PDDL domain and problem (for Scenario 2) targeting the FastDownwards solver.

public_information: To perform paltry action, preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, vase object_0 object_1, next object_1 object_2. Effects add: next object_0 object_2. Effects delete: vase object_0 object_1.

To perform sip action, preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, next object_0 object_2, next object_1 object_2. Effects add: vase object_0 object_1. Effects delete: next object_0 object_2.

To perform clip action, preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, next object_0 object_2. Effects add: vase object_0 object_1. Effects delete: next object_0 object_2.

To perform wretched action, preconditions: sneeze object_0, texture object_1, texture object_2, stupendous object_3, next object_0 object_1, collect object_1 object_3, collect object_2 object_3. Effects add: next object_0 object_2. Effects delete: next object_0 object_1.
To perform memory action, preconditions: cats object_0, spring object_1, spring object_2, next object_0 object_1. Effects add: next object_0 object_2. Effects delete: next object_0 object_1.

To perform tightfisted action, preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, vase object_0 object_1. Effects add: next object_0 object_2. Effects delete: vase object_0 object_1.

Initial conditions: cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_2, hand object_7, hand object_8, next object_0 object_6, next object_3 object_5, next object_4 object_6, next object_7 object_6, next object_8 object_5, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_6, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6.
Goal: next object_7 object_6 and next object_8 object_6.

Initial conditions: cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_2, hand object_7, hand object_8, next object_0 object_6, next object_3 object_5, next object_4 object_6, next object_7 object_6, next object_8 object_6, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_6, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6.
Goal: next object_7 object_5 and next object_8 object_5.
No plan is provided for Scenario 2; one must be synthesized.

normalize_actions.system_prompt: You are an expert in operator modeling. Extract and normalize action schemas from natural language into a structured specification with parameters, preconditions, add effects, and delete effects. Do not emit PDDL.
normalize_actions.prompt: Your name is action_modeler. From the public information, extract the six operators paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted. Represent each as a JSON object with fields name, parameters (all of type obj), preconditions (list of predicate tuples), add_effects, and del_effects. Preserve predicate arities exactly as described. Use only the symbols and objects mentioned in the environment public information.

scenario_1.system_prompt: You convert scenario text into structured instances. Do not emit PDDL.
scenario_1.prompt: Your name is instance_builder. Build Scenario 1 data: list all objects, enumerate initial atoms, and encode the conjunctive goal exactly as stated. Include the provided plan as an ordered list of grounded steps. Output a compact JSON object with fields objects, init, goal, plan.

scenario_2.system_prompt: You convert scenario text into structured instances. Do not emit PDDL.
scenario_2.prompt: Your name is instance_builder. Build Scenario 2 data: list all objects, enumerate initial atoms, and encode the conjunctive goal exactly as stated. No plan is provided. Output a compact JSON object with fields objects, init, goal.

audit_s1.system_prompt: You audit temporal and causal consistency and remove bookkeeping shortcuts. You never introduce quota tokens, post-hoc penalties, or other non-causal artifices.
audit_s1.prompt: Your name is consistency_auditor. Using the normalized action schema and Scenario 1 instance, check that each step of the provided plan is applicable, propagate effects, and confirm that the final state satisfies the goal. Report any violations, propose minimal corrections if needed, and summarize reusable planning guidelines. Output JSON with fields valid (boolean), issues (list), corrections (list), guidelines (list).

plan_s2.system_prompt: You synthesize grounded action sequences that are causally valid and avoid bookkeeping shortcuts. Do not emit PDDL.
plan_s2.prompt: Your name is planner. Using the action schema, Scenario 2 instance, and the auditor's guidelines, produce a grounded plan that achieves the Scenario 2 goal. Ensure every step's preconditions are met and effects advance the goal. Output a JSON object with fields plan (ordered list of action instances) and rationale (short notes on causal links).

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with multi-agent planning integration. Produce the final PDDL domain and problem targeting the FastDownwards solver. Always enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem>.
pddl.prompt: Your name is orchestrator. Integrate the normalized action schema and Scenario 2 instance into a single classical STRIPS PDDL domain and problem. Use a single type obj and declare all predicates as specified. The problem should contain the Scenario 2 objects, init, and goal. Ensure the encoding is compatible with the FastDownwards solver. Enclose the PDDL domain in <domain></domain> and the PDDL problem in <problem></problem>.
